item.description: Holiday Mondays are potluck game nights at Bobbi's house. We'll start a little earlier so we have time for food and games. 6pm at Bobbi's in south Nashua (just a couple of miles from Borders). I'll send directions to my house a few days before to everyone who RSVP'd "Yes."

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup
